description: Detects suspicious flags used by PsExec and PAExec to escalate a command line to LOCAL_SYSTEM rights
false_positives: Admins that use PsExec or PAExec to escalate to the SYSTEM account for maintenance purposes (rare)
name: PsExec/PAExec Escalation to LOCAL SYSTEM
query: (process.command_line:*\ \-s\ cmd.exe AND process.command_line:(*PsExec* OR *PAExec* OR *accepteula* OR *cmd\ \/c\ *))
author: Florian Roth
